{{Actor| | type = Gore | name = Twitching hanged corpse | class = BloodyTwitch | game = Doom | doomednum = 49 }}[[Classes]]: BloodyTwitch
 →[[Classes:NonsolidTwitch|NonsolidTwitch]] A twitching half-naked corpse with its legs torn off. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR BloodyTwitch { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 68 +{{Flag|SOLID}} +{{Flag|NOGRAVITY}} +{{Flag|SPAWNCEILING}} States { Spawn: GOR1 A 10 GOR1 B 15 GOR1 C 8 GOR1 B 6 Loop } }
